sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Intel ( INTC ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.0%.
Year to date, Intel has lost about 21.8% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Verizon Communications ( VZ ), trading up 0.3%.
Verizon Communications is lower by about 3.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading up 0.6%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 2.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
